channel.title: Best pking style
channel.description:
In you opinion what is the best pking style? (hybrid, mauler, rune pure)
I started a black pure and quickly found out that he sucks so i was wandering if i were to make another pking account what should i make his stats be?
*note* he is going to F2P for a little bit. *note*

item.title: Best pking style
item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182
item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:10, topic:369578”]I PK with corrupt dragon scimitar and corrupt dragon battleaxe on F2P worlds.

inb4wasteofmoney[/quote]
Lol

Read full topic

item.title: Best pking style
item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182
item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:8, topic:369578”][quote author=R A R E S link=topic=465705.msg3405441#msg3405441 date=1290281522]

Mauler, Hybrid, or Tank.

well i do not fully understand a hybrid could you tell me please?
[/quote]

A hybrid is using more than 1 style of combat.
Range + Melee. Melee + Mage. Mage + Range.
Sometimes people use all 3 but not always necessary.[/quote]
Welfare or Tribrid Brah

Read full topic

item.title: Best pking style
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“R A R E S, post:2, topic:369578”][quote author=I Vain I link=topic=465705.msg3405402#msg3405402 date=1290280607]
Mauler, Hybrid, or Tank.
[/quote]
well i do not fully understand a hybrid could you tell me please?[/quote]

A hybrid is using more than 1 style of combat.
Range + Melee. Melee + Mage. Mage + Range.
Sometimes people use all 3 but not always necessary.

Read full topic

item.title: Best pking style
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Don’t do corrupt dragon, unless you have good money to spare, say 10-20m+.

If you have the money, I suggest doing Rune Scim -> Corrupt D2h.[/quote]
There actually isn’ t a corrupt dragon 2hander, the strongest corrupt dragon weapon available would be the battleaxe.

Read full topic

item.title: Best pking style
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

[quote=“R A R E S, post:4, topic:369578”][quote author=Sanskrit link=topic=465705.msg3405448#msg3405448 date=1290281957]
Hybrid is a mix of all the combat stats. A good hybrid build for p2p:
60 att
high str
1 def
high mage
high range
high hp
44-52 prayer

I prefer tanking, because most of the pures these days are kids who watched a few pk vids and thought they could do it too. Pking is more fun at higher levels in my opinion.
[/quote]
what would a good F2P pker have
?[/quote]

F2p you could have 40-60 attack depending on what weapons you use to k0 (rune 2h, dungeoneering weapons, corrupt dragon).

The prayer for f2p would be 44 and below. If you like to pk in a team, keep it 44, but otherwise just have level 1 or 31 prayer.

Read full topic

item.description:
@R_A_R_E_S wrote:

I Vain I:
